name: Some Abandoned Projects
description:
These are some projects that I abandoned a long time ago. Enjoy :)

Sound effects are made by myself. Music generally is as well.
Exceptions:
- Vital music (Gravity Sound)

Note: At the time of uploading this page it seems that Itch's image server is down or something. I'll fix screenshots and stuff when I can.

Caveeyat

A platformer game about building your own house from items bought from a merchant. Money is earned by scavenging. Did not get that far, obviously.
Controls:
- A and D to move, space to jump. Can double jump.
- Q to open/close inventory while scavenging. You can open it at your home, but that's not intentional.
- Click to shoot.
- Mousewheel fast to reload.
- E to interact. Interactables have a thingy above their head while you are standing near them.
- Click to build if interacted with building table.
- Can't be bothered to look up the building table controls but there's a few stuff like mirror, change color, etc.

Project: Plot

Prototype of building for a game about building stuff. That's pretty much it.
Controls:
- WASD to move.
- Click to place block.
- Right click to erase block.
- Move mouse to move his very tiny face and floppy arms. Very good boy.

Vital (Dungeon)

Having the story for Vital in mind, I could never decide what I wanted to do with the game. I was always too ambitious. This is one of the versions I tried. Includes a basic, seeded dungeon and a bare-bones survival mode.
Controls:
- WASD to move.
- Click to shoot.
- Hold shift to run.
- E to interact.

Vital

Intended to be my final iteration of Vital. My goal was to create a sort of roguelite Warioware-type game. I'm still pretty happy with it. This is currently being remade into a much different game.
Controls: (1) Top-down shooter
- WASD to move.
- Click to shoot.
- Right-click to shoot offhand.
- Space to swap weapons.
- E to interact (hover over item).
Controls: (2) ASCII
- WASD to move.
- Hold click to ready sword. Swing to mark enemies. Let go to hit marked enemies.
Controls: (3) 3D something
- WASD to move.
- Mouse to look around.
- Left click to shoot.
- Space to jump.
